e: 例⃝「`子~`承~`父業~，`表現~`依舊~`亮眼~，`果然~`是~`虎父無犬子~」。
d.f: `比喻~`能力~`強~`的~`父親~，`不會~`養育~`出~`懦弱~`無能~`的~`兒子~。

Deutsch: Wie der Vater so der Sohn ( wörtl. "Vater Tiger hat keinen Hund zum Sohn" )  (Sprichw)
English: lit. father a lion, son cannot be a dog (honorific); With a distinguished father such as you, the son is sure to do well.
